statements: SELECT * FROM RobotBlueprints;
SELECT blueprint_name, robot_type FROM RobotBlueprints WHERE designer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM RobotBlueprints WHERE robot_type = 'Android' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT designer_name, COUNT(*) AS blueprint_count FROM RobotBlueprints GROUP BY designer_name;
SELECT blueprint_name, robot_type, designer_name FROM RobotBlueprints WHERE blueprint_id = 3;
SELECT blueprint_name, robot_type FROM RobotBlueprints WHERE blueprint_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RobotBlueprints WHERE designer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_blueprints FROM RobotBlueprints;
SELECT blueprint_name, designer_name FROM RobotBlueprints WHERE robot_type = 'Android' AND designer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT designer_name, COUNT(*) AS blueprint_count FROM RobotBlueprints GROUP BY designer_name ORDER BY blueprint_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Robots;
SELECT robot_name, blueprint FROM Robots;
SELECT robot_name, version FROM Robots WHERE version > 2;
SELECT robot_name, blueprint FROM Robots ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM RobotDesigns WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Robots WHERE version > 5 ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT robot_name, version FROM Robots WHERE robot_name LIKE 'R%' AND blueprint <> 'N/A';
SELECT rd.design_id, r.robot_name, rd.design_specifications FROM Robots r JOIN RobotDesigns rd ON r.robot_id = rd.robot_id WHERE rd.design_specifications LIKE '%advanced%';
SELECT robot_name, COUNT(*) AS design_count FROM Robots r JOIN RobotDesigns rd ON r.robot_id = rd.robot_id GROUP BY robot_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT robot_name, version FROM Robots ORDER BY version DESC, robot_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RobotBlueprints;
SELECT blueprint_name, robot_type FROM RobotBlueprints WHERE robot_type = 'Android';
SELECT * FROM RobotVersions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM RobotUsers WHERE username LIKE 'user%';
SELECT version_id, version_number, created_at FROM RobotVersions WHERE version_number > 5;
SELECT * FROM RobotBlueprints;
SELECT blueprint_name, robot_type, created_at FROM RobotBlueprints ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT robot_type FROM RobotBlueprints;
SELECT rb.blueprint_name, rv.version_number, rv.version_data FROM RobotBlueprints rb INNER JOIN RobotVersions rv ON rb.id = rv.blueprint_id;
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM RobotUsers WHERE created_at > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_name, date_created FROM robots ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT robot_name, part_name FROM robots INNER JOIN robot_parts ON robots.robot_id = robot_parts.robot_id WHERE robots.robot_name = 'RoboCop';
SELECT robot_name, version_number, changes_description FROM robots INNER JOIN robot_versions ON robots.robot_id = robot_versions.robot_id;
SELECT designer_name, robot_name FROM designers INNER JOIN robots ON designers.robot_id = robots.robot_id WHERE designers.designer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE robot_name = 'R2-D2';
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, date_created FROM robots WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT designer_name, robot_name FROM designers JOIN robots ON designers.robot_id = robots.robot_id WHERE robot_name LIKE '%bot%';
SELECT robot_name, part_name FROM robots JOIN robot_parts ON robots.robot_id = robot_parts.robot_id ORDER BY robot_name ASC, part_name DESC;
SELECT robot_name, version_number, changes_description FROM robots JOIN robot_versions ON robots.robot_id = robot_versions.robot_id WHERE changes_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date_published DESC;
SELECT * FROM Robots;
SELECT name, design FROM Robots WHERE version > 1;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM Parts ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM Versions WHERE version_number = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM Robots WHERE version = 1;
SELECT name, design FROM Robots WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM Parts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT r.name AS robot_name, b.name AS blueprint_name FROM Robots r JOIN Blueprints b ON r.id = b.robot_id;
SELECT u.username, u.email, r.name AS robot_name FROM Users u INNER JOIN Robots r ON u.id = r.id WHERE u.role = 'admin';
